# layoutManagers

**Instance Property**

The layout managers for the text storage object.

## Declaration

```swift
var layoutManagers: [NSLayoutManager] { get }
```

## Accessing the layout managers

- **addLayoutManager(_:)**: Adds a layout manager to the text storage object’s set of layout managers.
- **removeLayoutManager(_:)**: Removes a layout manager from the text storage object’s set of layout managers.
